description: Generates a temporary authorization token for accessing repositories in the domain. This API requires the codeartifact:GetAuthorizationToken and sts:GetServiceBearerToken permissions. For more information about authorization tokens, see CodeArtifact authentication and tokens.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain that is in scope for the generated authorization token.

nested_items.name: expiration
nested_items.description: A timestamp that specifies the date and time the authorization token expires.
